faq.q: Can foreigners legally get married in Sri Lanka?
faq.a: Yes. We handle affidavits, passport copies, birth certificates and registrar coordination. Plan for ~4 working days lead time for legal formalities.
We only partner with vetted sanctuaries that meet welfare standards. If you prefer, we provide cultural alternatives—Kandyan drummers, vintage cars, horse carriages.

faq.q: What's the best month for a beach wedding?
faq.a: Nov–Apr (south/west coasts) & May–Sep (east coast: Trincomalee, Passikudah) for the most reliable weather windows.

faq.q: What's included in a typical honeymoon package?
faq.a: Private driver-guide, selected boutique stays, activities (Sigiriya, tea trails, safaris), breakfasts or half-board, and 24/7 concierge.
Absolutely—menus, décor palettes, guest logistics, cultural ceremonies, transport, and post-wedding trips are all tailor-made.

faq.q: How early should we secure a date and venue?
faq.a: Begin at least 9–12 months ahead so every legal formality, décor detail and guest room is locked-in long before your big day.

faq.q: What sustainability options do you offer?
faq.a: Choose local, organic flowers, plastic-free décor, reef-safe confetti and give-back add-ons like tree-planting or community donations to keep your celebration planet-positive.

faq.q: Is a destination wedding really cost-effective?
faq.a: With slimmer guest lists and bundled venue deals, couples often spend less than on a large hometown event—while upgrading the overall experience.

faq.q: Can we combine our wedding and honeymoon?
faq.a: Yes—many couples roll straight into a tea-country mini-moon or beach retreat, turning one trip into a seamless celebration and escape.

faq.q: Do you arrange guest activities beyond the big day?
faq.a: Yes—think lagoon cruises, wildlife safaris, cultural parades or spa days so guests enjoy a full holiday experience.

faq.q: Can we include beauty and wellness treatments?
faq.a: Absolutely—bridal hair & makeup, spa rituals and pre-wedding wellness packages can be integrated for you and your party.

faq.q: How is local culture woven into ceremonies?
faq.a: Options range from Kandyan drummers and dancers to Hindu blessings, Sri Maha Bodhi sapling plantings and regional menus that honour local heritage.

faq.q: Why do modern couples choose destination weddings?
faq.a: They crave unique settings, intimate guest lists, cost efficiency and the freedom to merge wedding and honeymoon into one epic trip.

faq.q: How do you handle safety, security and accessibility?
faq.a: We vet venues for 24-hour security, wheelchair-friendly layouts and emergency medical plans so every guest feels comfortable and safe.
Welcome hampers, childcare, dietary-specific catering and concierge for special requests are all part of our guest-care menu.
